Title: What Do You Do
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Michael Brandt, Derek Haas, Cole Maliska (story editor), Mike Batistick (story editor), Mo Masi (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: After they are kidnapped while tackling a dangerous smuggling operation, Roman and Burgess pursue a man without calling for backup. Intelligence are spending the day receiving taser certification.
